LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Part 5: Other vehicles (Alfa Romeo x1, Kia Rio x2, Kia Ceres x1, Daewoo Tico x1, Daewoo Matis x1, Chevrolet Matis x1, Chevrolet Aveo x1, Chevrolet Spark x1, Chevrolet Matis x1, Lada Niva x2, Mercedes E class 270 CDI x1 — 12 vehicles)

DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: Warranty for qualitative performance of the contract: 10 %.

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: In order to prove its personal status, the economical operator should submit the following documents:
— statement of the economic operator stating that no effective verdict has been pronounced in the past 5 years for participation in criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering,
— confirmation that no bankruptcy procedure has been initiated by a competent authority,
— confirmation that no liquidation procedure has been initiated by a competent authority,
— confirmation for paid taxes, contributions and other public fees from the authority competent in the country where the economic operator has been registered,

— confirmation from the registry for penalties for committed criminal acts of the legal entities stating that no secondary penalty, ban on participation in open call procedures, on awarding of contracts for public procurement and contracts on public-private partnership has been pronounced,

— confirmation from the registry for penalties for committed criminal acts of the legal entities stating that no secondary penalty, temporary penalty or permanent ban on the performance of particular activity has been pronounced,

— confirmation stating that no misdemeanour sanction — ban on the performance of the profession, activity or obligation, i.e. temporary ban on the performance of a particular activity has been pronounced with the effective verdict.
Capability for performing professional activity of the economical operator:
A document for registered professional activity.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: 1. Reference list of executed deliveries of goods/services of the same or similar type with the subject procurement in the last 3 years with indication of suppliers data, value of contracts and dates, attaching at least one certificate for timely and qualitative executed goods/services for the listed contracts, issued by the suppliers that are listed in the reference sheet (obligatory use of Appendix 4 of this tender documentation)
2. Statement that he disposes with a servicing space, indicating location data and square meters for the same (it is obligatory to use Appendix 1 of this tender documentation)
3. A list of staff with their educational and professional qualifications (a copy of M1/M2 forms or a temporary engagement contract, as well as a copy of certificates or authorizations)

4. Statement on the technical equipment and competence of the economic operator with data on disposing with: workstations, equipment and large tools for diagnosing and repairing vehicles, defect diagnostic apparatus, software for computer diagnostics of defects), minimum 4 vehicle hoists and chamber for auto painting services, workstations, as well as other data on equipment and potential (mandatory use of Appendix 2 of this Tender Documentation)

Statement for disposal of servicing space on the territory of the City of Skopje, as well as equipment (tools) for servicing, balancing and installation of a pneumatic tire (obligatory use of Appendix 3 of this Tender Documentation).

T_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: 1. The economic operator needs to have executed a minimum of 1 (one) contract for deliveries of goods/services of the same or similar type with the subject procurement in the last 3 years

2. The economic operator needs to dispose with a servicing space on the territory of the City of Skopje with a minimum of 300 m2 in which the servicing of the vehicles subject to the procurement will be performed

3. The economic operator needs to have employed or engaged at least 6 people, out of which at least 3 mechanics, minimum (1) one auto electrician, minimum (1) one auto tinsmith and minimum (1) auto painter

4. The economic operator needs to dispose with equipment (tools) for servicing and diagnosing defects (workstations, equipment and large tools for diagnosing and repairing vehicles, defect diagnostic apparatus, software for diagnostics of defects), minimum 4 hoists for vehicles and a chamber for auto paint services technical or professional capability.
The economic operator needs to dispose with a servicing space on the territory of the City of Skopje, as well as with equipment (tools) for servicing, balancing and installation of tires.

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: more information can be fount at www.e-nabavki.gov.mk
